name: ZCREW
description:
"ZCREW" is an topdown shooting game that supports up to 4 players to cooperate. In the world destroyed by the alien virus, any mission is extremely challenging. Players need to fight side by side in a good tacit understanding and work hard on the road of rebuilding civil order.

At present, some scenes of ruined city and lost desert have been opened in the game. You will face crazy attacks from infected humans, mutant insects and more unknown creatures.

The main features of the game are:
★Support local single player games and online fighting together, you can enter randomly during the battle;
★If friendly forces are injured, please organize firepower reasonably when teaming up;
★Various firearm systems and component functions, customize your own special weapons;
★Uniquely matched characters, you can choose a profession and strengthen your skills according to your combat needs;
★Rich quest gameplay, with various conditions such as assassination, transportation, defense, occupation and rescue.

The game is still in Early Access early access stage, we will continue to improve the game content in the next year.
